title: Billiards at the 2017 Summer Universiade
text: <a href="Billiards">Billiards</a> at the <a href="2017%20Summer%20Universiade">2017 Summer Universiade</a> was held in the Expo Dome, <a href="Taipei%20Expo%20Park">Taipei Expo Park</a>, <a href="Taipei%20City">Taipei City</a>, <a href="Taiwan">Taiwan</a>, from August 25 to 29, 2017. Four competitions were held in men's and women's single <a href="9-ball">9-ball</a> and in men and women's team 9-ball. Due to its status as a demonstration sport, the medals won in this sport event will be awarded, but will not be computed in the overall medal table.
